text: Viva Villa! is a 1934 American western movie directed by Jack Conway and Howard Hawks and was based on the 1933 novel of the same name by Edgecumb Pinchon and O. B. Stade. It stars Wallace Beery, Leo Carrillo, Fay Wray, Donald Cook, Stuart Erwin, Ralph Bushman and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. It was nominated for 4 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1935. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1934 movies Category:1930s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Conway Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks Category:Movies directed by William A. Wellman
title: Viva Villa
